data.title: Nice Mexican restaurant
data.text: I came here 3 days in a row. They have bruce lunch menus for about $8 with a soda, but my best meal was when I ordered a 7 mares soup. It is a large soup with all kind or sea food! Very good.

data.title: Good Fish Fillet, Mexican Style
data.text: This is the first time we came to this restaurant since a new owner took over. We found that they raised the prices quite a bit. I had the grilled fish fillet with garlic and pico de gallo and rice. The fish was cooked just right. I cut out a mouthful piece of fillet, mixed with pico de gallo and rice and top with Mexican salsa and the wrap it like a burrito using flour tortilla. It was very tasty and juicy.

data.title: Massing Around for Mexican food
data.text: Great stuff went to the one in Ontario off of Vineyard Ave a bit old but the food is good😌 Yes I would return again. Why three circles because of the restaurant needs to be up dated. Nice people!

data.title: Maybe avoid the Daily Specials. Average quality but clean, fst and pleasant
data.text:
Had the Tuesday daily special. $1.00 tacos. MISTAKE.
In hindsight I should have just ordered off the menu.

I ordered 4 asada and 2 carnita with extra cilantro. The 6 white corn tacos were served in about 10 minutes. Had to order a soda though as that is required for daily specials (they have to make some $$).

The carnitas was moist and tender. Flavor was good but not anything to write home about. The asada was not good. Very dried out. No flavor at all. You'd think there would be some caramelized goodness... no. None. I tried the asada by itself to see what it tasted like without salsa, onions, lime and cilantro. Tasted like nothing. Just dried and chewy protein. Kind of like heavy banana-box-cardboard. Not the flavorful grilled flank steak you'd expect. This was very disappointing since I ordered 4 of them.

Note: the cilantro was mostly chopped stems and imparted very little flavor.

The service was very fast and friendly. The booths, chairs and tables were all clean. Parking is plentiful.

data.title: Very good Mexican food.
data.text: This restaurant is a classic. It has so many choices it is hard to decide. I have not found a bad choice in over 15 years.

data.title: Real Mex food, a gem
data.text: Authentic Mexican cuisine, and the best chicken mole ever,. Great service (Oscar). overall great prices, and terrific variety.

data.title: Good mariscos
data.text: The place is consistently good. They have a good menu with many choices and the prices, as you would expect, are inexpensive. Not cheap, but a good value.

data.title: My go to Mexican restaurant.
data.text: You when you get that craving for something that will hit the spot. This is the place for me. everything is fresh made to order and taste great. I usually get a Mexican standard Taquitos but the beans and rice have a great authentic taste as well. I go alone and now I have friends that go with me that I have taken there as well. Chips are fresh. Salsa and fresh guacamole are very good as well.
